# **Release Details**

## 

Christmas Around the World Chooses Cantaloupe, Inc. Point-of-Sale Solutions to Power its Inaugural Event this Holiday Season

November 19, 2024

[PDF Version](/node/22001/pdf)

_Cutting-Edge Cantaloupe POS Technology Delivers Fast Payments for Ohio’s Largest Holiday Festival Nov. 29 to Jan. 4_

MALVERN, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 19, 2024-- **Cantaloupe, Inc. (Nasdaq: CTLP)**, a global leading provider of end-to-end technology solutions for self-service commerce, has been selected as the official point-of-sale (POS) partner for **Christmas Around the World** , an immersive holiday experience debuting this season in Northeast Ohio. Running from November 29 through January 4, 2025, at Lake Erie Crushers Stadium in Avon, Ohio, the five-week event is expected to draw more than 100,000 attendees, who will visit and explore themed holiday attractions and unique shopping and dining options from around the globe. Cantaloupe was selected based on the company’s high volume processing capabilities and an engaging interface that delights both event goers and vendors at every sales touchpoint. To support hundreds of vendors and deliver seamless transactions, Cantaloupe’s advanced mobile handheld POS devices will be used throughout the festival. 

This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241119633101/en/>

![Cantaloupe, Inc. \(Nasdaq: CTLP\), has been selected as the official point-of-sale \(POS\) partner for Christmas Around the World, an immersive holiday experience debuting this season in Northeast Ohio, that runs from November 29 through January 4, 2025, at Lake Erie Crushers Stadium in Avon, Ohio. The five-week event is expected to draw more than 100,000 attendees, who will visit and explore themed holiday attractions and unique shopping and dining options from around the globe. \(Graphic: Business Wire\)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20241119633101/en/2309308/4/Christmas-Around-the-World.jpg)

Cantaloupe, Inc. (Nasdaq: CTLP), has been selected as the official point-of-sale (POS) partner for Christmas Around the World, an immersive holiday experience debuting this season in Northeast Ohio, that runs from November 29 through January 4, 2025, at Lake Erie Crushers Stadium in Avon, Ohio. The five-week event is expected to draw more than 100,000 attendees, who will visit and explore themed holiday attractions and unique shopping and dining options from around the globe. (Graphic: Business Wire)

“Cantaloupe is thrilled to support Christmas Around the World’s immersive holiday experience,” noted Jake Stone, vice president of partnerships with Cantaloupe. “Our mobile handheld POS solutions are ideal for high-traffic events, providing the speed and reliability needed to elevate the guest experience at every purchase point.” 

Kyle Roggenburk, chief finance and data officer at USA Expo, added, “Partnering with Cantaloupe was a natural fit for us. Their handheld devices are designed to handle large-scale events, making them perfect for our vendors and helping us provide the best possible experience for our guests.” 

Cantaloupe’s handheld devices offer rapid, secure transactions to minimize wait times and let attendees spend more time enjoying the festivities. Cantaloupe’s mobile handheld POS accepts all major payment types, including Apple Pay and Google Pay, and features Wi-Fi and LTE connectivity, a rear camera, a built-in barcode reader, and a printer — all designed to create a frictionless transaction experience. 

This collaboration highlights Cantaloupe’s ongoing expansion into new verticals, offering festivals and large venues cutting-edge, mobile-first POS solutions. With its reliable, high-capacity technology, Cantaloupe is delivering on its mission to revolutionize event experiences for vendors and guests alike. 

For more information, visit [www.cantaloupe.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cantaloupe.com%2F&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=www.cantaloupe.com&index=1&md5=9d56dc75aff87225bca916f646ff8b03). 

**About Cantaloupe Inc.**

**Cantaloupe, Inc.** (Nasdaq: CTLP), is a global technology leader powering self-service commerce. Cantaloupe offers a comprehensive suite of solutions including micro-payment processing, self-checkout kiosks, mobile ordering, connected point of sale systems, and enterprise cloud software. Handling more than a billion transactions annually, Cantaloupe’s solutions enhance operational efficiency and consumer engagement across sectors like food & beverage markets, smart automated retail, hospitality, entertainment venues and more. Committed to innovation, Cantaloupe drives advancements in digital payments and business optimization, serving over 30,000 customers in the U.S., U.K., EU countries, Australia, and Mexico. For more information, visit [cantaloupe.com ](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cantaloupe.com%2F&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=cantaloupe.com&index=2&md5=4c15deb6c1ac9cbe4f396d89bd25caa0)or follow on [LinkedIn](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fcantaloupeinc%2F&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=LinkedIn&index=3&md5=b36c4defcd5b32844f3ed30c4043940e), [Twitter (X)](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2Fcantaloupeinc_&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=Twitter+%28X%29&index=4&md5=db91b632721b4cd9af02b809a6c71235), [Facebook](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fthecantaloupeinc&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=Facebook&index=5&md5=7f8abbcec4965f58423403fd8b0c1bad), [Instagram](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fcantaloupe.inc%2F&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=Instagram&index=6&md5=ad4c087381d6e7fbb8ea8d88a86a9c0c) or [YouTube](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40Cantaloupe_Inc&esheet=54154878&newsitemid=20241119633101&lan=en-US&anchor=YouTube&index=7&md5=bdcf68b9a64688de1821b302eda7485a).

# **Release Details**

## 

Cantaloupe, Inc. Honored with Two Prestigious Technology Association of Georgia Awards for Innovation and Impact in Fintech

November 15, 2024

[PDF Version](/node/21996/pdf)

_Cantaloupe Awarded the TAG Fintech ADVANCE Award and the Innovation Driven Company Award_

ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 15, 2024-- **Cantaloupe, Inc. (Nasdaq: CTLP)**, a global leading provider of end-to-end technology solutions for self-service commerce, has been recognized by the **Technology Association of Georgia (TAG)** with two significant awards: the TAG Fintech ADVANCE award and the Innovation Driven Company award. These accolades celebrate Cantaloupe’s presence in the Atlanta financial technology community and are a recognition of the impact that Cantaloupe is making in the sector. 

This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241115704463/en/>

![Ravi Venkatesan, CEO of Cantaloupe, Inc., along with Gaurav Singal, chief technology officer, accept one of two awards presented to them recently from the Technology Association of Georgia. The awards were for Innovation and Impact in Fintech. \(Photo: Business Wire\)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20241115704463/en/2306339/4/IMG_3703.jpg)

Ravi Venkatesan, CEO of Cantaloupe, Inc., along with Gaurav Singal, chief technology officer, accept one of two awards presented to them recently from the Technology Association of Georgia. The awards were for Innovation and Impact in Fintech. (Photo: Business Wire)

The TAG Fintech ADVANCE award was presented at the _Fintech South_ conference on August 28, and the 2024 Innovation Driven Company award was presented at the 2024 TAG Technology Awards on November 6. 

“We are thrilled to be honored by TAG with these two awards,” noted **Ravi Venkatesan** , CEO of Cantaloupe, Inc. “Cantaloupe’s strong presence in the Atlanta community, coupled with our commitment of innovation, have been essential to our success. Most of the world’s payments are run through an Atlanta-based company and this statistic highlights the profound impact of technology on our lives and underscores the need for businesses to stay ahead of the curve. In fact, the move toward self-service retail with cashless and contactless payments has been at the forefront of our innovation.” 

The **TAG Fintech ADVANCE Award** acknowledges U.S.-based fintech companies making significant strides in advancing financial services through innovation. The award criteria was open to mature companies with strong ties to Georgia and the ADVANCE Award recognizes those who have shown leadership in tech-driven solutions that are reshaping the industry. Cantaloupe’s cutting-edge technology and dedication to advancing the fintech landscape distinguished the company from other contenders. 

The **2024 TAG Technology award for** **an Innovation Driven Company** **in the Enterprise category** (for companies with over $50 million in revenue), honors companies across Georgia that have leveraged technological innovation to drive excellence and standout success across diverse industries. 

“Receiving the TAG Technology Award is a meaningful recognition of our work in developing groundbreaking technologies that enhance the consumer experience,” noted **Gaurav Singal** , chief technology officer of Cantaloupe, Inc. “This award also showcases our dedication to empowering businesses with tools that not only drive efficiency but also enhance customer engagement.” 

These recognitions affirm Cantaloupe’s strategic direction and strong market position in self-service commerce. With a comprehensive suite of services, including micro-payments processing, cloud software solutions, IoT technology, and innovations in point-of-sale, Cantaloupe continues to empower businesses and redefine the customer experience. 

These prestigious awards also highlight Cantaloupe’s influence in the Georgia tech landscape and the growing role of fintech in driving economic and technological progress. As Cantaloupe expands its reach and enhances its offerings, it remains a committed partner to enterprises seeking efficient and innovative solutions in the fast-evolving self-service and fintech sectors. 

For more information, visit [www.cantaloupe.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cantaloupe.com%2F&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=www.cantaloupe.com&index=1&md5=bdb330f4bcef26d16b9d8786b05c510a). 

**About Cantaloupe Inc.**

**Cantaloupe, Inc.** (Nasdaq: CTLP), is a global technology leader powering self-service commerce. Cantaloupe offers a comprehensive suite of solutions including micro-payment processing, self-checkout kiosks, mobile ordering, connected point of sale systems, and enterprise cloud software. Handling more than a billion transactions annually, Cantaloupe’s solutions enhance operational efficiency and consumer engagement across sectors like food & beverage markets, smart automated retail, hospitality, entertainment venues and more. Committed to innovation, Cantaloupe drives advancements in digital payments and business optimization, serving over 30,000 customers in the U.S., U.K., EU countries, Australia, and Mexico. For more information, visit [cantaloupe.com ](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cantaloupe.com%2F&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=cantaloupe.com&index=2&md5=1596129e5fdb30ef0ba17471df89062e)or follow on [LinkedIn](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fcantaloupeinc%2F&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=LinkedIn&index=3&md5=c4e01a918613952656ea80bfe08bd2a1), [Twitter (X)](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2Fcantaloupeinc_&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=Twitter+%28X%29&index=4&md5=8169d270431d5ce822ee2df24fac2ea9), [Facebook](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fthecantaloupeinc&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=Facebook&index=5&md5=d4e5f7ce28268f3e9fce0986ceebec00), [Instagram](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fcantaloupe.inc%2F&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=Instagram&index=6&md5=483756cd11aa467d7f3a8291cbdd26f2) or [YouTube](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40Cantaloupe_Inc&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=YouTube&index=7&md5=4632d52d4cb62efa61a86c9f81b6d17f). 

**About the Technology Association of Georgia (TAG)**

TAG drives innovation among Georgia’s technology community, inspires tech leaders, and fosters inclusivity through four foundational pillars: Connect, Promote, Influence and Educate. TAG serves more than 30,000 members statewide through regional chapters in Metro Atlanta, Augusta, Columbus, Macon/Middle Georgia, and Savannah. TAG hosts more than 150 events each year and serves as an umbrella organization for 18 professional societies, including the TAG Fintech Society. For more information visit the TAG website at [www.tagonline.org](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.tagonline.org&esheet=54153449&newsitemid=20241115704463&lan=en-US&anchor=www.tagonline.org&index=8&md5=0c5a87a23295367414e5c057b7f990fd). 

Cashtag $CTLP G-CTLP 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241115704463r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241115704463/en/>
